Text: NBPL DealBench Auction Results Cc Todays live auction for Northern Border Pipelines procurement of line pipe was quite a success Here are some highlights The auction lasted longer than the scheduled minutes due to the automatic extension feature resulting from new Best Bids placed during the last two minutes of the auction Please note that we earned for this auction and are on track to do another auction for NBPL on for a fee Regards Ross

Summary of All DealBench Deals to Date Cc a spreadsheet that shows all deals that have been completedinprocess to date Please take a few minutes to see if anything from your domain has been omitted I will post this on our Deal Area so that you can update as appropriate Thanks Ross

EES Phase I Thrid Party Supplylike EES has pretty much decided to use us for this RFQ see the Word doc attached below remember that we have a meeting scheduled with EES on Monday to discuss a realtionship and pricing Lets make sure before our meeting that we are all in agreement as to the pricing approach we will take with them RM Forwarded by Ross MesquitaNAEnron on PM From Samuel Harrell EES PM To Javier ES Dag ES L Michelle ES Scott ES Michael O ES Peter ES Christopher ES Bryan ES Charles AlluredWestern RegionThe Bentley xchange cc Jerry ES Wayne ES Jess ES Brad J ES Maria ES Ross NRON Chris ES Subject Phase I Thrid Party Supply Refer to meeting notes for updatestatus of third party supply process

FW NDA Booz Allen Hamilton Inc Cc I think I gave my legal team the wrong email address because this got bounced back to them but here is the NDA Please forward any questions and or changes to Tana Jones at Thanks Ross Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday October AM To Cc Mesquita Ross Koehler Anne C Subject NDA Booz Allen Hamilton Inc At the request of Ross Mesquita I am attaching our proposed form of NonDisclosure Agreement If the enclosed meets with your approval please execute the agreement and return it to me via fax no I will then have it executed by Enron If you have any comments or questions please call Anne Koehler Senior Counsel at or me at We look forward to hearing from you

FW Fwd Enron Net Works NDATana Attached you will find the comments on the NDA from BoozAllen Hamilton Any chance we could get this spun back to them today I provided you with the wrong email address for Eduardo yesterday the correct address is Regards Ross Original Message From Alvarez Eduardo mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Mesquita Ross Subject Fwd Enron Net Works NDA Ross this is our input could you forward to your legal department thank you eduardo Inline attachment follows From To Alvarez Eduardo Date Thursday October GMT Subject Eduardo Sal is out of the office today and tomorrow I am also an attorney for Booz Allen and work with Sal in New York I have reviewed the NDA my recommended revisions are enclosed Regards Deborah

RE Fwd Enron Net Works NDAI am meeting with Eduardo at am on Monday so is there any way someone can look at it today I am fine with it being finalized on Monday morning before my meeting but if there is a problem with their revised language need to address that today Please let me know Thanks Ross Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday October AM To Mesquita Ross Subject RE Fwd Enron Net Works NDA Not unless its critical All the attorneys are out at an offsite today Can this wait til Monday or is this critical Original Message From Mesquita Ross Sent Friday October AM To Jones Tana Subject FW Fwd Enron Net Works NDA Tana Attached you will find the comments on the NDA from BoozAllen Hamilton Any chance we could get this spun back to them today I provided you with the wrong email address for Eduardo yesterday the correct address is Regards Ross Original Message From Alvarez Eduardo mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Mesquita Ross Subject Fwd Enron Net Works NDA Ross this is our input could you forward to your legal department thank you eduardo

NDATana Could you please provide me with an NDA that will cover discussions regarding the sale of DealBench This NDA would be similar to those that you put together for DealBench PurchasePro and Thomsen Financial I would like to get a draft of this on Monday please I know that you usually email NDAs directly to the company but I want to take a different approach on this one I have a meeting the CEO on Tuesday in which we will not discuss confidential info just high level discussions If that meeting goes well I want to have the NDA ready to go so we can move to the next stage of discussions quickly Please let me know if you need any other information besides the following James W Pritchett CEO Petris Technology Inc St James Place Seventh Floor Houston TX Thanks Ross

Another NDATana Can I please get one more NDA related to the sale of DealBench prepared This one is for InfrastructureWorld and the contact is Lenny Izzo who is a Vice President He asked that you fax the NDA to Please email it to him as well I would like to get this one done today if at all possible Thanks so much Ross CONTACT INFO AT INFRASTRUCTUREWORLD Lenny Izzo Vice President InfrastructureWorld Inc Oyster Point Blvd Suite South San Francisco CA

Screen Shots of a Complex IOS Auctionand Michelle Thanks for taking the time to meet with me yesterday to discuss DealBench and the IOS process I will work with my technical team to schedule a meeting sometime next week with you and Rich Abromowitz Michelle when you get a chance can you please fax to my attention the screen shots from an IOS auction that contained some of the complexities we discussed yesterday I have verified that Enron Net Works is a separate legal entity from ENA so I think we are okay from that standpoint My fax number is Thanks so much Ross Mesquita
